attributes.review: This app made my house catch on fire twice and made pigeons eat my little sister, it also gave Soulja boi my address so Soulja boi comes to my house three times a week while screaming “youuuuuuuuu crank dat Soulja boi” and it also gave me COVID-23(worse than COVID-19) and malaria. I also saw a picture of Donald trump doing some explicit things to animals such as dogs, cats, frogs, swordfish and rats (free Ratatouille and 6ix9ine 2020) and also the second you open the app the song “BE HAPPY” by Dixie D’Amelio plays full blast on your phone and you can’t do anything about it. so yeah if you don’t want life long PTSD and and annual seizures, don’t get this app it sucks🚀

(The Best of Both Worlds by Miley Cyrus)

(Come on)

You get the limo out front

Yeah, when you're famous it can be kinda fun

Would double as a superstar

Then you rock out the show

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and within 2 seconds Siri popped up and called me the n word and said I was a radical antifa leftist. Then the app hacked my messages and sent texts to all my relatives calling them ugly and saying I wish they were dead. Then to make it even worse it broke into my bank account and purchased 15 Elkay EZS8L, Wall Mounted Water Fountains. For the final blow my phone exploded and lit on fire and the app sent me an Android in the mail. If I could give it less than 1 star I would🤮!!!
attributes.title: Don’t do this to your phone!!!

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!!! every time i open it i get constipated and all of my teeth fall out. just last night i tried to go on the app to read about the amazing things trump is doing for our country, and i ended up sitting on the toilet for HOURS because i couldn't poop. but once i turned the app off, i started having explosive diarrhea and my sharts got all over the bathroom floor. then i opened the app back up to try again while brushing my teeth and as soon as my toothbrush hit my teeth they all fell off my gums. i was able to find all the the teeth but the tooth fairy wouldn't come😡. i blame you mr president.
